description:
Contains everything you need to conduct a proper bleed on SRAM hydraulic disc brakes, including X0, XX, Guide, Level, and Hydro R series brakes.

  • Kit contents:2 syringes, hose fittings, 1 T25/T10 Torx™ wrench, bleeding edge fitting, bleed blocks, and 1 crow's foot wrench
name: SRAM Pro Brake Bleed Kit
